title: Get User Records — get_user_records
text: function sends request specified URL, appending necessary details URL path, fetches user records based count parameter. count 100, additional requests sent batches 100 count fulfilled.

title: Get User Records — get_user_records
code: get_user_records(   request,   key,   repo,   collection,   count,   throttle = c(3000, 300) )

title: Get User Records — get_user_records
text: request request URL. key API key. repo repository. collection collection. count number records fetch. count greater 100, function send multiple requests batches 100. throttle vector specifying rate limit c(requests, seconds). number requests divisible requests, function pause seconds seconds. Defaults c(3000, 300).
